original: @164a / /'phags pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba /
analyzed: @164a / /'phags pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba /

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhabs dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhabs dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo //

original: phyogs bcu @164b brjod kyis mi lang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / sa chen por chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol /
analyzed: phyogs bcu @164b brjod kyis mi lang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / sa chen por chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol /
translated: All you buddhas in the world systems of the ten directions, and all you great bodhisattva great beings who have reached the great grounds, please pay me heed!

analyzed: gang bdag gis skye ba 'di dang / skye ba gzhan du na khyim pa'am /

analyzed: ji ltar mi gsal ba /

analyzed: ji ltar mi mkhas pa / ji ltar 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi rang bzhin can de ltar nongs pa nongs par bshags par bgyi'o //

translated: Having confessed each fault, I will refrain from such actions in the future.ğŸ”½Having confessed each fault, I will refrain from such actions in the future.ğŸ”½Having confessed each fault, I will refrain from such actions in the future.

original: yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bdag la dgongs su gsol /
analyzed: yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bdag la dgongs su gsol /
translated: Again, O Blessed Buddhas, please pay attention to me!

original: gang sangs rgyas thams cad sngon byang chub sems dpar @165b gyur pa rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa /
analyzed: gang sangs rgyas thams cad sngon byang chub sems dpar @165b gyur pa rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa /
translated: Whatever six perfections all the Buddhas of the past have completed in order to become Bodhisattvas,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: they are:

original: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor /
analyzed: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor /
translated: They fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood through generosity, ethical discipline, patience, perseverance, meditative concentration, and wisdom, and then turn the wheel of the Dharma.

original: chos kyi dung kun nas bus /ğŸ”½chos kyi rnga rab tu brdungs /
analyzed: chos kyi dung kun nas bus / chos kyi rnga rab tu brdungs /
translated: They blow the conch of the Dharma.ğŸ”½They beat the drum of the Dharma.

original: chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad /
analyzed: chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad /
translated: They light the lamp of the Dharma.

original: chos dang mthun par chos sgrub pa dag la sems can gyi khams rab tu btsud /
analyzed: chos dang mthun par chos sgrub pa dag la sems can gyi khams rab tu btsud /
translated: They establish beings in the Dharma in accordance with the Dharma.

original: dam pa'i chos kyi tshul rab tu bstan cing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis rang sangs rgyas rnams rang sangs rgyas nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nyan thos rnams nyan thos nyid rtogs par 'gyur zhing rig pa gsum dang /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyi tshul rab tu bstan cing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis rang sangs rgyas rnams rang sangs rgyas nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nyan thos rnams nyan thos nyid rtogs par 'gyur zhing rig pa gsum dang /
translated: They teach the way of the sacred Dharma, and they cause the roots of virtue that enable solitary buddhas to realize their state of solitary buddhahood and the roots of virtue that enable hearers to realize their state of hearer to arise.

original: mngon par shes pa drug rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa mngon du 'gyur zhing bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba dang /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa drug rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa mngon du 'gyur zhing bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba dang /
translated: They will realize the six superknowledges, and the four discernments will manifest. They will attain the concentrations, liberations, meditative stabilizations, and meditative absorptions, and they will have the roots of virtue that enable them to transcend the hells,

original: dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa @166a *//
analyzed: dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa @166a *//
translated: animal rebirths, and the world of Yama, and to transcend the lower realms, bad rebirths, and bad destinies. They will abandon attachment, anger, and ignorance, and the afflictions and subsidiary afflictions.

original: spong ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / gnod pa chung ba dang / mdog bzang ba dang / gzugs bzang ba dang / gzi brjid che ba dang / dbang che ba dang / rigs mtho ba dang / longs spyod che ba dang / shes rab che ba dang /
analyzed: spong ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / gnod pa chung ba dang / mdog bzang ba dang / gzugs bzang ba dang / gzi brjid che ba dang / dbang che ba dang / rigs mtho ba dang / longs spyod che ba dang / shes rab che ba dang /
translated: They will have long lives, few illnesses, good complexions, good physiques, great splendor, great power, high status, great wealth, and great wisdom.

original: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad spangs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / tha na phyag gcig 'tshal ba dang / thal mo gcig sbyor ba dang / me tog gcig 'bul ba dang / sems dang ba gcig tsam skyed pa'i sems can gang lags pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ste /
analyzed: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad spangs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / tha na phyag gcig 'tshal ba dang / thal mo gcig sbyor ba dang / me tog gcig 'bul ba dang / sems dang ba gcig tsam skyed pa'i sems can gang lags pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ste /
translated: I rejoice in all those sentient beings who have abandoned all unwholesome actions, who have all the roots of virtue, who have made even a single prostration, who have joined their palms even once, who have offered even a single flower, or who have generated even a single instant of faith.

original: rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ngo //
analyzed: rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ngo //
translated: I rejoice in them with the highest rejoicing.

original: gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / ra ba dang / phul dang / bla na ma mchis pa dang / gong nam mchis pa dang / gong ma'i yang gong ma dang / mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang /
analyzed: gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / ra ba dang / phul dang / bla na ma mchis pa dang / gong nam mchis pa dang / gong ma'i yang gong ma dang / mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang /
translated: I rejoice with the foremost, the best, the excellent, the supreme, the unsurpassed, the highest, the exalted, the unequaled, the equal of the unequaled,

original: mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang / nam mkha' ltar dag cing yongs su dag pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang ngo //
analyzed: mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang / nam mkha' ltar dag cing yongs su dag pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang ngo //
translated: the incomparable, the pure like space, and the completely pure rejoicing.

original: gang dag gis chos thams cad yang dag par thugs su chud nas chos la dgyes pa dang / chos la nges pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa dang / yon tan thams cad yongs su skyong zhing yongs su bsngo ba dang /
analyzed: gang dag gis chos thams cad yang dag par thugs su chud nas chos la dgyes pa dang / chos la nges pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa dang / yon tan thams cad yongs su skyong zhing yongs su bsngo ba dang /
translated: He has realized all phenomena and delights in the Dharma. He has certainty in the Dharma and has generated all roots of virtue. He protects all beings and preserves and dedicates all qualities.

original: chos kyi phung po stong phrag kun @166b dang; bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dam bcas pa dang / smon lam dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa dang; ston pa dang /
analyzed: chos kyi phung po stong phrag kun @166b dang; bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dam bcas pa dang / smon lam dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa dang; ston pa dang /
translated: He has realized the entire collection of the thousand dharmas, all the dhyÄnas, liberations, samÄdhis, and samÄpattis, his vows, aspirations, knowledge of the exhaustion of defilements, and his teachings.

original: bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin shes pa yang dag par thugs su chud la /
analyzed: bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin shes pa yang dag par thugs su chud la /
translated: He has realized the latent tendencies, the dhÄtus, and the nature.

original: chud nas kyang sems can gyi khams bka' blo mi bde bar mkhyen nas thugs khral chung dur thugs 'jog par mdzad cing chos ston par mi mdzad pa de dag la bdag skul ma 'debs te /
analyzed: chud nas kyang sems can gyi khams bka' blo mi bde bar mkhyen nas thugs khral chung dur thugs 'jog par mdzad cing chos ston par mi mdzad pa de dag la bdag skul ma 'debs te /
translated: When he has entered, he knows that the realm of sentient beings is unhappy and he sets his mind on a small amount of worry and does not teach the Dharma.

original: skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po'i don dang / lha dang / mi rnams la sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du dam pa'i chos bshad du gsol /
analyzed: skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po'i don dang / lha dang / mi rnams la sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du dam pa'i chos bshad du gsol /
translated: I encourage those who are doctors for many beings, who are happy for many beings, who have compassion for the world, who are for the sake of many beings, who are doctors for gods and humans, and who are for the sake of happiness, to explain the holy Dharma.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor du gsol /ğŸ”½chos kyi dung kun nas bud du gsol /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor du gsol / chos kyi dung kun nas bud du gsol /
translated: Please turn the wheel of the Dharma.ğŸ”½Please blow the conch of the Dharma.

original: chos kyi rnga brdung du gsol /
analyzed: chos kyi rnga brdung du gsol /
translated: Please beat the drum of the Dharma.

original: chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad du gsol /
analyzed: chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad du gsol /
translated: Please light the lamp of the Dharma.

original: chos dang mthun par chos sgrub pa dag la sems can gyi khams rab tu dgod du gsol /
analyzed: chos dang mthun par chos sgrub pa dag la sems can gyi khams rab tu dgod du gsol /
translated: Please set the realm of sentient beings in accordance with the Dharma and in the practice of the Dharma.

original: gang dag tshe la dbang ba /ğŸ”½sprul pa la dbang ba /
analyzed: gang dag tshe la dbang ba / sprul pa la dbang ba /
translated: Those who have power over life,ğŸ”½those who have power over emanations,

original: byin gyi rlabs la dbang ba /
analyzed: byin gyi rlabs la dbang ba /
translated: those who have power over blessings,

original: rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba sems can gdul ba'i tshogs smin par mdzad pa dbang du gyur pa /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba sems can gdul ba'i tshogs smin par mdzad pa dbang du gyur pa /
translated: You have power over miracles, and you have matured the assembly of disciples.

original: dbang du ma gyur pa rnams la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar thugs gzhol zhing sku tshe 'dor bar @167a *//
analyzed: dbang du ma gyur pa rnams la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar thugs gzhol zhing sku tshe 'dor bar @167a *//
translated: You are ready to pass into parinirvÄá¹‡a, to give up your life for those who are not yet ready.

original: mdzad pa de dag la bdag gsol ba 'debs te /
analyzed: mdzad pa de dag la bdag gsol ba 'debs te /
translated: I supplicate you.

original: skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po'i don dang / lha dang / mi rnams la sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du sku tshe'i 'du byed rnams byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
analyzed: skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po'i don dang / lha dang / mi rnams la sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du sku tshe'i 'du byed rnams byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
translated: Bless the conditions of your life so that you may benefit many beings, so that you may bring happiness to many beings, so that you may have compassion for the world, so that you may benefit the many assemblies of beings, so that you may benefit gods and humans, and so that you may bring them happiness.

original: gang bdag gis 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' ma 'tshal ba nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bgyis shing bsags pa lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal ba dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba; sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /
analyzed: gang bdag gis 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' ma 'tshal ba nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bgyis shing bsags pa lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal ba dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba; sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /
translated: by means of the bases of meritorious action that arise from generosity,

original: tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tha na sems can gcig gi sems dang ba gcig tsam bskyed par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tha na sems can gcig gi sems dang ba gcig tsam bskyed par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o //
translated: by means of the bases of meritorious action that arise from morality and from meditation, and even by means of the single thought of faith that a single sentient being has generated, I dedicate it all to all sentient beings.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
translated: By means of these roots of virtue, may all the roots of virtue of all sentient beings be perfected.

original: tshe ring ba dang / gnod pa chung ba dang / mdog bzang ba dang / gzugs bzang ba dang / gzi brjid che ba dang / dbang che ba dang / rigs mtho ba dang / longs spyod che ba dang / shes rab che ba dang /
analyzed: tshe ring ba dang / gnod pa chung ba dang / mdog bzang ba dang / gzugs bzang ba dang / gzi brjid che ba dang / dbang che ba dang / rigs mtho ba dang / longs spyod che ba dang / shes rab che ba dang /
translated: long life, few illnesses, good complexion, good form, great splendor, great power, high caste, great wealth, great wisdom,

original: rdzas dang / sngags dang / sman rnyed pa dang / @167b dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / chos dang mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa dang / 'dod chags dang /
analyzed: rdzas dang / sngags dang / sman rnyed pa dang / @167b dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / chos dang mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa dang / 'dod chags dang /
translated: gaining substances, mantras, and medicine, meeting with spiritual friends, listening to the sublime Dharma, proper mental engagement, practicing the Dharma in accordance with the Dharma, abandoning attachment,

original: zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /
analyzed: zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /
translated: aversion, and the afflictions of delusion and the secondary afflictions, and completely transcending the realms of hell beings, animals, and the world of Yamaâ€”the lower realms, the unfortunate realms, the wrong paths,

original: bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad thob pa dang / lus las byung ba dang / sems las byung ba'i yid mi bde ba las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / bde ba dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad thob pa dang / lus las byung ba dang / sems las byung ba'i yid mi bde ba las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / bde ba dang /
translated: It is to attain all the meditative concentrations, liberations, samÄdhis, and absorptions. It is to transcend both physical and mental suffering.

original: yid bde ba thams cad 'thob pa dang / nyan thos kyi yon tan gyi mchog nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi mchog nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: yid bde ba thams cad 'thob pa dang / nyan thos kyi yon tan gyi mchog nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi mchog nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
translated: It is to attain all happiness and mental ease. It is to attain the supreme qualities of the hearers and the supreme qualities of the solitary buddhas. It is to attain the ten powers of the thus-gone ones, the four types of fearlessness, the four types of correct understanding,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / bag chags 'joms pa dang / bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / bag chags 'joms pa dang / bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang /
translated: the eighteen unique qualities of the buddhas, great love, great compassion, great joy, and great equanimity. It is to destroy habitual tendencies and to be free from forgetfulness.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ye shes mi zad pa nyid dang / shes rab mi zad pa nyid dang / spobs pa mi zad pa nyid dang / bsod nams mi zad pa nyid dang / nam @168a *//
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ye shes mi zad pa nyid dang / shes rab mi zad pa nyid dang / spobs pa mi zad pa nyid dang / bsod nams mi zad pa nyid dang / nam @168a *//
translated: omniscience, knowledge of all aspects, inexhaustible wisdom, inexhaustible insight, inexhaustible eloquence, inexhaustible merit,

original: mkha' mdzod nyid dang / lag na rin po che nyid dang / bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob pa dang / gzhan yang /
analyzed: mkha' mdzod nyid dang / lag na rin po che nyid dang / bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob pa dang / gzhan yang /
translated: the sky treasury, the jewel in the hand, the attainment of unsurpassed omniscient wisdom, and

original: 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang / gang lags pa de dag sems can thams cad la yang dag par grub par gyur cig /
analyzed: 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang / gang lags pa de dag sems can thams cad la yang dag par grub par gyur cig /
translated: all mundane and supramundane roots of virtue, may they be perfectly accomplished for all sentient beings.

original: gang sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba bgyis pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos pa de las bsod nams kyi 'bras bu yod pa gang lags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
analyzed: gang sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba bgyis pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos pa de las bsod nams kyi 'bras bu yod pa gang lags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
translated: Whatever roots of virtue I have dedicated to all sentient beings, by this dedication of roots of virtue, may I, through the fruits of that merit,ğŸ”½having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can ma brgal ba rnams ni bsgral bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can ma brgal ba rnams ni bsgral bar bgyi'o //
translated: liberate those sentient beings who are not liberated,

original: ma grol ba rnams ni dgrol bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: ma grol ba rnams ni dgrol bar bgyi'o //
translated: free those who are not freed,

original: dbugs ma byin pa rnams ni dbugs 'byung bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: dbugs ma byin pa rnams ni dbugs 'byung bar bgyi'o //
translated: give breath to those who do not have breath,

original: mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bgyi'o //
translated: and lead to complete nirvÄá¹‡a those who have not attained nirvÄá¹‡a.

original: sman pa dang / bde ba'i mtha'i gnas kyi gzhi la rab tu dgod par bgyi ste /
analyzed: sman pa dang / bde ba'i mtha'i gnas kyi gzhi la rab tu dgod par bgyi ste /
translated: I will establish them in the state of the ultimate happiness of medicine.

original: de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du'o //
analyzed: de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du'o //
translated: In this way, a second and a third time.

original: 'phags pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba rdzogs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba rdzogs so //
translated: The noble dedication called â€œFulfilling All Wishesâ€ is complete.
